snippet.title: PSX Longplay [609] Jojo's Bizarre Adventure
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: RickyC

I only started watching the anime this year and thought I would check out what games based off it where out there. I was surprised how fun a fighter this actually is. It tells the story well and the characters are very fun to play as. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
